lines.text: Well, I don't know exactly what Slick was after, but if I had to guess...
That bottle of extra-virgin virgin's blood would probably fetch a high price on the black market.
So maybe he didn't get out of the fire, because he was trying to go for the blood!
Except the blood's on the table over there, where there wasn't any fire.
Like, it was in the fire, and he was going for it, and then someone moved it to the table?
I know what boiled virgin's blood looks like, and that's not it.
I'm... not gonna ask why you know what boiled virgin's blood looks like.
I mean, in my line of work-
